analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x0c937b14640a33791f2e467a7e8030d84e636c21.sol:
	Contract BitMaxSHToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x0c937b14640a33791f2e467a7e8030d84e636c21.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x0c937b14640a33791f2e467a7e8030d84e636c21.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
